<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Risky Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=3163) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 112</row>

**Archetype** [Unexpected Sharpshooter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=123) (Level 4)

**Requirements**
You're wielding a firearm.

</column>

---

You've practiced a technique for rapidly reloading your firearm, but attempting to use this technique is a dangerous gamble with your firearm's functionality. Interact to reload a firearm, then make a Strike with that firearm. If the Strike fails, the firearm misfires.
name: Risky Reload
